QuestData.Title: Demonic Crystal Prisons
QuestData.Description: From assessing the scene, you note that Ar'tor is being held in place by energy beams emanating from the crystals hovering around the rune. Try as you might, Ar'tor is unmovable.$B$BYou note that the crystals have an empty slot at their base - perhaps for a key. It also seems as if succubi periodically perform some sort of ritual at the site.$B$BSearch Illidari Point for their leader. Perhaps she holds the key to releasing Ar'tor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out and slay Painmistress Gabrissa at Illidari Point and return to the corpse of Ar'tor, Son of Oronok with the Crystalline Key.
QuestData.RewardText: You slide the crystalline key into the slots at the base of each of the demonic crystals.
